00017 #define CACHE_DIM                       8U
00018 #define CACHE_MASK                      ( CACHE_DIM - 1 )
00019 #define INV_CACHE_MASK          ( ~CACHE_MASK )

00029 //----------------------------------------------------------
00030 GrSoftwareSampler::GrSoftwareSampler()
00031 : _sampleCount( 0 )
00032 , _color( 0xFFFFFFFF )
00033 , _image( 0 )
00034 , _bytesPerPel( 0 )
00035 , _width( 0 )
00036 , _height( 0 )
00037 , _uScale( 0.0f )
00038 , _vScale( 0.0f )
00039 , _stride( 0 )
00040 , _maskU( 0 )
00041 , _maskV( 0 )
00042 {
00043         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < SAMPLER_CACHE_LINE_COUNT; ++i )
00044         {
00046                 _cache[ i ] = ( unsigned int* )AlignedAlloc( 16, CACHE_DIM * CACHE_DIM * sizeof( unsigned int ) );
00047                 _cache[ i ][ 0 ] = _color;
00048 
00050                 _cacheX[ i ] = 0;
00051                 _cacheY[ i ] = 0;
00052                 _mipLevel[ i ] = 0;
00053                 _lastUsed[ i ] = 0;
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 //----------------------------------------------------------
00058 GrSoftwareSampler::~GrSoftwareSampler()
00059 {
00060         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < SAMPLER_CACHE_LINE_COUNT; ++i )
00061                 AlignedFree( _cache[ i ] );
00062 }

00069 //----------------------------------------------------------
00070 void
00071 GrSoftwareSampler::SetTexture( GrImage* image )
00072 {
00074         if ( image )
00075         {
00076                 B_ASSERT( IsPow2( image->GetWidth() ) );
00077                 B_ASSERT( IsPow2( image->GetHeight() ) );
00078 
00081                 _uScale = ( float )image->GetWidth();
00082                 _vScale = ( float )image->GetHeight();
00083                 _width = image->GetWidth();
00084                 _height = image->GetHeight();
00085                 _maskU = _width - 1;
00086                 _maskV = _height - 1;
00087                 _bytesPerPel = image->GetBytesPerPixel();
00088                 _stride = _bytesPerPel * image->GetWidth();
00089                 _image = image;
00090 
00092                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < SAMPLER_CACHE_LINE_COUNT; ++i )
00093                         FillCache( 0, 0, 0 );
00094         }
00095         else
00096         {
00097                 _uScale = 1.0f;
00098                 _vScale = 1.0f;
00099                 _width = 1;
00100                 _height = 1;
00101                 _maskU = 0;
00102                 _maskV = 0;
00103                 _bytesPerPel = 0;
00104                 _stride = 0;
00105                 _image = 0;
00106                 _cache[ 0 ][ 0 ] = _color;
00107         }
00108 }

00111 void
00112 GrSoftwareSampler::SetColor( unsigned int bgraColor )
00113 {
00114         _color = bgraColor;
00115         if ( !_image )
00116                 _cache[ 0 ][ 0 ] = _color;
00117 }

00140 //----------------------------------------------------------
00141 unsigned int
00142 GrSoftwareSampler::Sample( float u, float v )
00143 {
00145         unsigned int x = ( unsigned int )( int )( u * _uScale - 0.5f );
00146         unsigned int y = ( unsigned int )( int )( v * _vScale - 0.5f );
00147 
00149         return Fetch( x, y );
00150 }

00156         return SampleBump( *( const SVec2* )&uv, *( const SVec2* )&gradDX, *( const SVec2* )&gradDY, bumpScale );

00166 //----------------------------------------------------------
00167 SVec2
00168 GrSoftwareSampler::SampleBump( const SVec2& uv, const SVec2& gradDX, const SVec2& gradDY, float bumpScale )
00169 {
00171         float tcX0 = uv.x * _uScale - 0.5f;
00172         float tcY0 = uv.y * _vScale - 0.5f;
00173 
00175         SVec2 gradDXNorm( gradDX.x, gradDX.y );
00176         SVec2 gradDYNorm( gradDY.x, gradDY.y );
00177 
00179     if ( Abs( gradDX.x ) > 0.0001f || Abs( gradDX.y ) > 0.0001f )
00180         gradDXNorm.Normalize();
00181     if ( Abs( gradDY.x ) > 0.0001f || Abs( gradDY.y ) > 0.0001f )
00182         gradDYNorm.Normalize();
00183 
00185         SVec2 tcDX = gradDXNorm;
00186         SVec2 tcDY = gradDYNorm;
00187 
00188 #if 1
00190         int xDom = Abs( tcDX.y ) < Abs( tcDX.x );
00191         int xDomInv = xDom ^ 1;
00192         int yDom = Abs( tcDY.y ) < Abs( tcDY.x );
00193         int yDomInv = yDom ^ 1;
00194 
00197     float divDX = Abs( tcDX[ xDomInv ] );
00198     float divDY = Abs( tcDY[ yDomInv ] );
00199     float invDivDX = 1.0f;
00200     float invDivDY = 1.0f;
00201     if ( divDX > 0.0001f )
00202         invDivDX /= divDX;
00203     if ( divDY > 0.0001f )
00204         invDivDY /= divDY;
00205         tcDX[ xDom ] *= invDivDX;
00206         tcDX[ xDomInv ] *= invDivDX;
00207         tcDY[ yDom ] *= invDivDY;
00208         tcDY[ yDomInv ] *= invDivDY;
00209 #endif
00210 
00212         float tcX1 = tcX0 + tcDX.x;
00213         float tcY1 = tcY0 + tcDX.y;
00214         float tcX2 = tcX0 + tcDY.x;
00215         float tcY2 = tcY0 + tcDY.y;
00216 
00218         unsigned int x0 = ( unsigned int )( int )( tcX0 + 0.0625f );
00219         unsigned int y0 = ( unsigned int )( int )( tcY0 + 0.0625f );
00220         unsigned int x1 = ( unsigned int )( int )( tcX1 + 0.0625f );
00221         unsigned int y1 = ( unsigned int )( int )( tcY1 + 0.0625f );
00222         unsigned int x2 = ( unsigned int )( int )( tcX2 + 0.0625f );
00223         unsigned int y2 = ( unsigned int )( int )( tcY2 + 0.0625f );
00224 
00226         unsigned int v0  = Fetch( x0, y0 ) & 0xFF;
00227         unsigned int vDX = Fetch( x1, y1 ) & 0xFF;
00228         unsigned int vDY = Fetch( x2, y2 ) & 0xFF;
00229 
00231         float vf0  = 2.0f * ( ( float )( int )v0  / 255.0f ) - 1.0f;
00232         float vfDX = 2.0f * ( ( float )( int )vDX / 255.0f ) - 1.0f;
00233         float vfDY = 2.0f * ( ( float )( int )vDY / 255.0f ) - 1.0f;
00234 
00236         float dx = vf0 - vfDX;
00237         float dy = vf0 - vfDY;
00238         dx = Clamp( bumpScale * dx, -1.0f, 1.0f );
00239         dy = Clamp( bumpScale * dy, -1.0f, 1.0f );
00240 
00242         return SVec2( dx, dy );
00243 }

00250 //----------------------------------------------------------
00251 void
00252 GrSoftwareSampler::FillCache( unsigned int cacheLine, unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00253 {
00254         x &= INV_CACHE_MASK;
00255         y &= INV_CACHE_MASK;
00256         _cacheX[ cacheLine ] = x;
00257         _cacheY[ cacheLine ] = y;
00258         _mipLevel[ cacheLine ] = 0;
00259 
00261         switch ( _bytesPerPel )
00262         {
00263         case 4:
00264                 FillCache4( cacheLine, x, y );
00265                 break;
00266 
00267         case 3:
00268                 FillCache3( cacheLine, x, y );
00269                 break;
00270 
00271         case 2:
00272                 FillCache2( cacheLine, x, y );
00273                 break;
00274 
00275         case 1:
00276                 FillCache1( cacheLine, x, y );
00277                 break;
00278 
00279         default:
00280                 break;
00281         };
00282 }

00284 //----------------------------------------------------------
00285 void
00286 GrSoftwareSampler::FillCache4( unsigned int cacheLine, unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00287 {
00289         unsigned char* row = ( unsigned char* )_image->GetImageData() + y * _stride + ( x * _bytesPerPel );
00290         unsigned int* dst = _cache[ cacheLine ];
00291         unsigned int endY = Min( _height, CACHE_DIM );
00292         for ( unsigned int cy = 0; cy < endY; ++cy, ++y, row += _stride )
00293         {
00294                 unsigned int* src = ( unsigned int* )row;
00295                 unsigned int endX = Min( _width, CACHE_DIM );
00296                 for ( unsigned int cx = 0; cx < endX; ++cx, ++x, ++dst, ++src )
00297                         *dst = *src;
00298         }
00299 }
00300 
00301 //----------------------------------------------------------
00302 void
00303 GrSoftwareSampler::FillCache3( unsigned int cacheLine, unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00304 {
00306         unsigned char* row = ( unsigned char* )_image->GetImageData() + y * _stride + ( x * _bytesPerPel );
00307         unsigned int* dst = _cache[ cacheLine ];
00308 
00310         unsigned int endY = Min( _height, CACHE_DIM );
00311         for ( unsigned int cy = 0; cy < endY; ++cy, row += _stride )
00312         {
00314                 unsigned int initValue = 0xFF000000;
00315 //              initValue ^= initValue;
00316 //              initValue -= 1;
00317 //              initValue =  initValue << 24;
00318 
00320                 unsigned int endX = Min( _width, CACHE_DIM );
00321                 unsigned char* src = row;
00322                 for ( unsigned int cx = 0; cx < endX; ++cx, src += 3, ++dst )
00323                 {
00324                         *dst =  initValue;
00325                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] <<  0;
00326                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 1 ] <<  8;
00327                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 2 ] << 16;
00328                 }
00329         }
00330 }
00331 
00332 //----------------------------------------------------------
00333 void
00334 GrSoftwareSampler::FillCache2( unsigned int cacheLine, unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00335 {
00337         unsigned char* row = ( unsigned char* )_image->GetImageData() + y * _stride + ( x * _bytesPerPel );
00338         unsigned int* dst = _cache[ cacheLine ];
00339         unsigned int endY = Min( _height, CACHE_DIM );
00340         for ( unsigned int cy = 0; cy < endY; ++cy, ++y, row += _stride )
00341         {
00342                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )row;
00343                 unsigned int endX = Min( _width, CACHE_DIM );
00344                 for ( unsigned int cx = 0; cx < CACHE_DIM; ++cx, ++x, ++dst, src += 2 )
00345                 {
00346                         *dst =  ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] <<  0;
00347                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] <<  8;
00348                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] << 16;
00349                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 1 ] << 24;
00350                 }
00351         }
00352 }

00355 void
00356 GrSoftwareSampler::FillCache1( unsigned int cacheLine, unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00357 {
00359         unsigned char* row = ( unsigned char* )_image->GetImageData() + y * _stride + ( x * _bytesPerPel );
00360         unsigned int* dst = _cache[ cacheLine ];
00361         unsigned int endY = Min( _height, CACHE_DIM );
00362         for ( unsigned int cy = 0; cy < endY; ++cy, ++y, row += _stride )
00363         {
00364                 unsigned char* src = ( unsigned char* )row;
00365                 unsigned int endX = Min( _width, CACHE_DIM );
00366                 for ( unsigned int cx = 0; cx < endX; ++cx, ++x, ++dst, ++src )
00367                 {
00368                         *dst =  ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] <<  0;
00369                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] <<  8;
00370                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] << 16;
00371                         *dst |= ( unsigned int )src[ 0 ] << 24;
00372                 }
00373         }

00376 //----------------------------------------------------------
00377 unsigned int
00378 GrSoftwareSampler::Fetch( unsigned int x, unsigned int y )
00379 {
00381         x &= _maskU;
00382         y &= _maskV;
00383 
00385         ++_sampleCount;
00386 
00388         unsigned int oldest = 0;
00389         unsigned int lastUsed = _sampleCount;
00390         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < SAMPLER_CACHE_LINE_COUNT; ++i )
00391         {
00392                 unsigned int cacheX = x - _cacheX[ i ];
00393                 unsigned int cacheY = y - _cacheY[ i ];
00394                 if ( cacheX >= CACHE_DIM || cacheY >= CACHE_DIM )
00395                 {
00396                         if ( _lastUsed[ i ] < lastUsed )
00397                         {
00398                                 lastUsed = _lastUsed[ i ];
00399                                 oldest = i;
00400                         }
00401                 }
00402                 else
00403                 {
00404                         _lastUsed[ i ] = _sampleCount;
00405                         return _cache[ i ][ cacheY * CACHE_DIM + cacheX ];
00406                 }
00407         }
00408 
00410         FillCache( oldest, x, y );
00411         _lastUsed[ oldest ] = _sampleCount;
00412 
00415         unsigned int cacheX = x - _cacheX[ oldest ];
00416         unsigned int cacheY = y - _cacheY[ oldest ];
00417 
00419         return _cache[ oldest ][ cacheY * CACHE_DIM + cacheX ];
00420 }
